reference.title: cxxDefineParameter
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxDefineParameter> element describes a define parameter.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxDefineParameter> element describes a single parameter in an identifier-list.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxDefineDefinition> <cxxDefineAccessSpecifier value="public"/> <cxxDefinePrototype>#define MergeModes(a, b)</cxxDefinePrototype> <cxxDefineNameLookup>MergeModes</cxxDefineNameLookup> <cxxDefineParameters> <cxxDefineParameter> <cxxDefineParameterDeclarationName>a</cxxDefineParameterDeclarationName> <apiDefNote/> </cxxDefineParameter> <cxxDefineParameter> <cxxDefineParameterDeclarationName>b</cxxDefineParameterDeclarationName> <apiDefNote/> </cxxDefineParameter> </cxxDefineParameters> <cxxDefineAPIItemLocation> <cxxDefineDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="C:/EPOC/master/sf/os/commsfw/serialserver/c32serialserver/SCOMM/CS_PORT.CPP"/> <cxxDefineDeclarationFileLine name="lineNumber" value="126"/> </cxxDefineAPIItemLocation> </cxxDefineDefinition>
